title: Ep 106: Reduce Reuse Recycle
itunes:title: Ep 106: Reduce Reuse Recycle
itunes:subtitle: This week Kate and Doree break down how they got “glam” for the iHeart Radio Podcast Awards red carpet. Then, sans guest, they chat about how they’re (imperfectly) working toward making greener life choices and what it means for their self-care practic...
description:
This week Kate and Doree break down how they got “glam” for the iHeart Radio Podcast Awards red carpet. Then, sans guest, they chat about how they’re (imperfectly) working toward making greener life choices and what it means for their self-care practices and skincare obsessions.


We love to hear from you! To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by: 

  • HONEYBOOK - Get 50% off your first year when you go to honeybook.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • KIND - For 25%off your own custom variety pack, visit kindsnacks.com/forever35 and enter FOREVER35 in your shopping cart
  • THIRDLOVE - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • PRETTY LITTER - For 20% off your first order visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • STITCH FIX - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 and you'll get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box.
  • JOYBIRD - Head to joybird.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order with promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
